## BaseServer.\_onInputBufferError() method

When the server cannot parse input buffer to api/msg call By default, it will return "Input Buffer Error" .

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
protected _onInputBufferError(errMsg: string, conn: BaseConnection<ServiceType>, buf: Uint8Array): void;
```

void
